# Introduction
\code{gcplyr} is a package that implements a number of functions to make it
easier to import, manipulate, and analyze growth curve data generated by
a spectrophotometer.




```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(growth.curves.pkg)
```
